reviewText: very similar to nba's "below the rim"

My 4 year old LOVES to watch basketball.  We had recorded games on our DVR for him to watch; however, they were too long in duration and many commercials or commentary I deemed inappropriate.  This is a great, short DVD to let him watch!  It is appropriate in content for him to view and he loves it.
Very good enjoyed by all I had a couple of laughs from hell. Very good enjoyed by all I had a couple of laughs from hell.
Too short wanted more info and more guards. I felt like the video would of been much better if it showed more on their careers
I enjoyed my DVD... I got it on time, and in a fairly short time. The DVD was in great condition and it works great!  I never heard about this DVD Thanks again!
I am 71 and this brought back great memories of my younger days..it would be a great inspiration for the youth of today
